1.An external style sheet can be written in any text editor. The file should not contain any html tags. The style sheet file must be saved with a .css extension. 2.Inline Styles An inline style may be used to apply a unique style for a single element. To use inline styles, add the style attribute to the relevant element. The style attribute can contain any CSS property. An external style sheet can be written in any text editor. The file should not contain any html tags. The style sheet file must be saved with a .css extension. Here is how the "mystyle.css" file looks like:
